articles.author: Alex Harring
articles.title: The low-end consumer is about to feel the pinch as Trump restarts student loan collections - CNBC
articles.description: JPMorgan sees this action cutting billions from American's spendable cash pile each month.
articles.content: Wall Street is warning that the U.S. Department of Education's crack down on student loan repayments may take billions of dollars out of consumers' pockets and hit low income Americans particularly h… [+3964 chars]
